Name: ion-exchanger production for water treatment | ion-exchanger for water treatment | EN15804GD, U
Category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects
Description: Plant with a production of  100 m3/h. Two-bed system with a strong acidic cation resin volume of 5.3 m3 and a strong base anion resin volume of 2.8 m3. Unit is operated with counterflow regeneration, a defgasser and without lime decarbonation. Life time of the unit 15 y and of the resin 5 y. 7500 h/a operating time. Tank material stainless steel, lining PP.
